meanings.definition: To fail to fulfill a promise or obligation.
meanings.sent1: He welches on his promise to help me with my homework.
meanings.sent2: She always welches on her commitment to attend our meetings.
meanings.sent3: The cat welches on its duty to catch mice, preferring to nap instead.
meanings.sent4: The sun welches on its promise to shine, hiding behind dark clouds.
meanings.sent5: The student welches on studying for the exam, choosing to play video games instead.

meanings.definition: A person who fails to fulfill a promise or obligation.
meanings.sent1: Don't be a welches and break your word.
meanings.sent2: She is known as a welches for never keeping her promises.
meanings.sent3: The welches always has an excuse for not showing up on time.
meanings.sent4: Being a welches is like being a cloud that never rains.
meanings.sent5: The welches in our group is the one who never contributes but always expects help.
